replies.body: Better not be an April Fool Prank. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
next month I hope elementalist {{champion:99}} goes on sale

It's usually  4-6 months after release that early sales happen. Elementalist Lux was released....near the end of November/early December right? 


It could..maybe next month...but I am betting June for that skin to be on early sale.
Ultimate skins NEVER go on sale, not even for the early sale. Legendary skins ONLY go on sale during early sales.

Oh how people forget. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts

> 
> We also want players to have a chance to get a deal on skins of any tier, which conflicts with the fact that we previously didn’t discount legendary skins (1820s). So we're making future Legendary skins eligible for the early sale (previously released 1820s won’t be going on sale though). This’ll be the only time Legendary** and Ultimate skins** will be purchasable at a direct discount.
> 
> Here’s how it’ll break down:
> 
> Tier 	Sale Price
> 3250 	2450
> 1820 	1350
> 1350 	975
> 975 	750
> 750 	520
> 
> Bringing all of our skins onto the same early sale schedule means there will no longer be a launch sale for 1350s and Ultimates starting in the new year.
Ultimate skins don't go on sale
They go on early sales now.
do you think draven draven will release again on this april fools?
Waited two years. Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao is finally going on sale.
April fools prank: all skins on sale become teemo skins
Hey why i dont see a Viktor Skin Sale in there? oh... i know, because there is nothing to sell for him ( only 3 skins for almost 4 years now?)

{{champion:202}}     {{champion:24}}
HOLY SHIT YES IM SO HAPPY THIS ACTUALLY IS TRUE IM SOOOOOOOOOOOO FREAKING HAPPY YES STAR GUARDIAN JINX!!!!!!!!

Is this just a joke? I've been logging on league everyday since march 20th just waiting on freaking star guardian jinx sale and still no sign of it. I don't mind being patient but if it turns out that april ends and still no star guardian jinx skin sale, I'm gonna be pissed. Like why do you have authorization to post this if it isn't true, granted it probably won't be personally your fault if riot chooses to not go with the skin sale for jinx star guardian for april 2017. Literally log in everyday just waiting for the sale for star guardian jinx skin.
Usually the early sales skins go on sale in the last week of the month.
okay thank you so much for some clarification. I'll be logging in everyday regardless but for sure next week should be the week then.
Ok, she is on sale now.
FINALLY HOLY FK I BEEN WAITING SO LONG IM SO FUCKING HAPPY!!!!! 30 days of waiting man
You don't have to do it everyday, skins sales change every Monday and Friday. They release the list of the upcoming sales a day before.

I'm just building habit to login everyday so that way I don't miss it. Better safe than crying that I missed the sale. On another note, I just think it's very confusing that it's called "early sale" if it's towards the end of the month. Similar to how armor pen easily is countered by armor unless you get last whisper and I don't consider that as armor pen as the stat specificallyed called armor penetration was usually a flat amount and not a percentage. So it's just funny that it's name is meant to penetrate armor, but you buy armor to counter armor penetration, hence why I think riot changed the name armor pen into lethality.
